### Notice Type: Request for Proposal

The Department of National Defence (DND) invites proposal submissions from qualified suppliers to establish a contract for one (1) Intermediate Integrated Logistics Support (ILS) Specialist under Stream 5, Technical Engineering and Maintenance Services. 

### Tender Details

**Contracting Entity**: Department of National Defence (DND)
**Contracting Address**: 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K2, Canada
**Contact Information**:
— Kayla Shabsove, kayla.shabsove@forces.gc.ca (343) 596-9352

**Tender Closing Date**: Friday, February 9, 2024 at 2:00 PM EST

**Notice URL**: unavailable

**PDF Document**: [Download: W8486-249475-A-NPP-20240125](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30450/w8486-249475-a-npp-20240125.pdf)

**Requirements Description**
DND seeks an ILS Specialist to provide intermediate support services for Continued Operational Management Support (COMS) and other systems. The Contractor shall provide high-quality support in aspects such as documentation updates, training, simulation and technical servicing to meet defined Canadian Army routine cyber security, disaster recovery and blue force tracking tasking and requirements.

**Eligibility**: Pre-qualified suppliers under the Tasks and Solutions Professional Service (TSPS) Supply Arrangement (SA) number E60ZT-18TSPS.

  ***
### Evaluation and Shortlisting
Bids will be evaluated on a combined rating of technical merit and price. The Solicitation document has comprehensive information for the bidder.
